invalidEmailError.ios: -ios class chain:**/XCUIElementTypeStaticText[`label == 'Long Error String For Invalid Email'`]
invalidEmailError.android: android=new UiSelector().resourceIdMatches('.*:id/Long Error String For Invalid Email')

invalidPasswordError.ios: -ios class chain:**/XCUIElementTypeStaticText[`label == 'Long Error String For Invalid Password'`]
invalidPasswordError.android: android=new UiSelector().resourceIdMatches('.*:id/Long Error String For Invalid Password')
